tests.name: HTTP 400: Missing Required Fields
tests.details: **Error:** `400 Bad Request` — Returned when required fields are missing or the request is malformed.

tests.name: HTTP 400: Validation Error
tests.details: **Error:** `400 Bad Request` — Returned when field values fail validation (e.g., invalid email format).

tests.name: HTTP 401: Authentication Required
tests.details: **Error:** `401 Unauthorized` — Returned when no Authorization header is provided on a protected endpoint.

tests.name: HTTP 401: Invalid Token
tests.details: **Error:** `401 Unauthorized` — Returned when the provided token is invalid or expired.

tests.name: HTTP 404: User Not Found
tests.details: **Error:** `404 Not Found` — Returned when the requested resource does not exist.

tests.name: HTTP 404: Collection Not Found
tests.details: **Error:** `404 Not Found` — Returned when the requested collection does not exist.
